Title: My Life
Actors: Michael Keaton, Nicole Kidman, Bradley Whitford, Queen Latifah
Plot: Life is going well for Bob Jones: great job, beautiful loving wife and a baby on the way. Then he finds out that he has kidney cancer that will leave him dead within months. He sets out to videotape his life's acquired wisdom for his child, and ends up on a voyage of self-discovery and reconciliation.
Production: Zucker Brothers Productions, Capella Films, Columbia Pictures Corporation
